remove.xpath: /traders/trader_item_groups/trader_item_group/item[starts-with(@name,'bowsSkillMagazine') or starts-with(@name,'spearsSkillMagazine') or starts-with(@name,'clubsSkillMagazine') or starts-with(@name,'sledgehammersSkillMagazine') or starts-with(@name,'knucklesSkillMagazine') or starts-with(@name,'bladesSkillMagazine') or starts-with(@name,'handgunsSkillMagazine') or starts-with(@name,'shotgunsSkillMagazine') or starts-with(@name,'riflesSkillMagazine') or starts-with(@name,'machineGunsSkillMagazine')]
